summary: This document is an email forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case, sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO-NY) Epstein Victims email address. The email was sent on August 12, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Prosecutors
events.description: An email with an attached voice message was sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein Victims email address.

keyFacts: A voice message was forwarded to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO-NY) on August 12, 2019.
The communication was directed to a specific email address for Epstein victims ('USANYS-EpsteinVicti').
The email was sent the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in federal custody on August 10, 2019.
The document is a metadata header showing an email forwarding an audio file (20190812_080841.wav).
